TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed Application/MessageLoopCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Application.MessageLoopCallback() As Boolean
type Application.MessageLoopCallback = delegate of unit -> bool

Docs.summary: Represents a method that will check whether the hosting environment is still sending messages.
Docs.returns: if the hosting environment is still sending messages; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This delegate is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RegisterMessageLoop%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
